data.title: Charter School in Tampa
data.meta_description: Horizon Charter of Tampa strives to keep pace with the quickly changing technological world. Learn more about our charter school in Tampa.
data.text:
Horizon Charter School of Tampa is a free, public charter school in Hillsborough County, Florida. Operating since 2003, HCST serves students in grades kindergarten through 8. Our staff integrates educational technology to provide expansive learning opportunities for all of our students. Through a flexible and creative curriculum, our team is able to recognize and meet the unique needs of each student we instruct. This allows us to tailor each student’s style of learning and help them cultivate a love of learning that will serve them well in the future!

At Horizon Charter of Tampa, we strive to keep pace with the rapidly changing technological world. Technology enhances a student’s educational experience and aids in preparation for the modern workplace. Help us provide our students with the most up-to-date equipment by contributing to our school.

Donate securely via PayPal; an account is not required.
